etymology.description: Variant form of 藝(藝) (yì, "art") -> 艸(艸) (cǎo, "grass") + 云(云) (yún, "cloud") added
etymology.interpretation: 蓺 is a variant of 藝, initially represented by 埶, which was later combined with 艸 representing 'grass, plant' and 云 for phonetic enhancement. The combination evokes the cultivation of skill as an art form.
